explanation: [0-0] In a white wardrobe, a man dressed in red is hanging inside, and the word "Monday" appears on the screen.

[0-8] Subsequently, a hand pushes the man from the right side of the wardrobe to the left. Immediately afterwards, the man returns to his original position, and a hand pushes him from right to left again. The word "Tuesday" appears on the screen. Then, the camera keeps repeating the previous actions, with the words "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", and "Saturday" appearing on the screen one after another.
